Class ReservationService

java.lang.Object
com.example.ioproject.security.services.ReservationService
@Service public class ReservationService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing reservations. Provides methods to create, retrieve, update, and delete reservations, as well as handle payment statuses and vehicle availability.

  • Method Details

    • createAndSavePendingReservation

      public Reservation createAndSavePendingReservation(Long clientId, int vehicleId, String startDate, String endDate, double cost)
      Creates and saves a new reservation with "PENDING" status.
      Parameters:
      clientId - the ID of the client
      vehicleId - the ID of the vehicle
      startDate - the reservation start date (as String)
      endDate - the reservation end date (as String)
      cost - the total cost of the reservation
      Returns:
      the saved Reservation

    • getAllReservations

    • isVehicleAvailable

      public boolean isVehicleAvailable(int vehicleId, String startDate, String endDate)
      Checks whether a vehicle is available for a given date range.
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - the ID of the vehicle
      startDate - the start date to check
      endDate - the end date to check
      Returns:
      true if no conflicting reservations exist; false otherwise

      Parameters:

      sessionId - the Stripe session ID to set
